tool_description: Detects and analyzes conflicts between role assignments including segregation of duties violations.

user_identifier.description: User identifier to check for conflicts

proposed_roles.description: List of role IDs being considered for assignment

existing_roles.description: List of currently assigned role IDs

conflict_rules.description: Conflict rule set: sox_compliance, financial, healthcare, general

severity_filter.description: Minimum severity to report: low, medium, high, critical

error_messages: Invalid user identifier: User identifier must be a non-empty string.
Empty proposed roles: At least one proposed role must be provided.
Invalid conflict rules: Use one of [sox_compliance, financial, healthcare, general].
Invalid severity filter: Use one of [low, medium, high, critical].
Conflict detection failed: Unable to complete conflict analysis due to engine error.
usage: Provide user_identifier and proposed_roles array. Optionally include existing_roles for comprehensive analysis and set conflict_rules and severity_filter for targeted detection.

severity_levels.description: Severity level for each detected conflict

mitigation_options.description: Possible ways to resolve or mitigate conflicts
